name: Endless Worlds
description:
Explore an infinite world with 8 unique biomes and complete customizability.

Controls:

  • Movement is WASD and Space to jump.
  • Mouse moves the camera.
  • Hold LMB to dig, Alt + LMB to build.
  • Press G to throw a sticky light.

It is recommended that you download the game as the browser version is much less performant.

Requires a good processer and at least 10 GB of RAM to run smoothly.
